text:
Kiernan Brennan Shipka (born November 10, 1999) is an American actress. She is best known for her role as Sally Draper in the AMC drama series "Mad Men" and as Sabrina Spellman in the Netflix series "Chilling Adventures of Sabrina".
She also appeared as B. D. Hyman in the FX series ' and voiced Jinora in "The Legend of Korra".
